paper_title: The least-squares analysis of the moments of the charge distribution in the mean-field models
abstract: Comparing the moments of the charge distribution in the mean-field models with experimental values from electron scattering, each value of the related moments of the point proton and neutron distributions is estimated in $^{40}$Ca, $^{48}$Ca and $^{208}$Pb by the least-squares analysis(LSA).
